modelCorrections.rawOutput:
Here's the corrected HTML based on the WCAG 2.1 violation description:

*Extracted text from website*: "Numismatic Mats to protect your"
- Incorrect HTML: <html>
- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en">

Explanation:
The <html> element should have a lang attribute to specify the language of the document. This helps assistive technologies, such as screen readers, to correctly interpret and pronounce the content. In this case, assuming the content is in English, the corrected HTML includes the lang attribute with the value "en".
